eps.name: Horizons
eps.desc: A violent murder occurs at the hotel where Todd works, with unusual characters - including Dirk Gently - intruding on his hitherto mundane life.

eps.name: Lost & Found
eps.desc: Todd reluctantly works with Dirk, tries to rescue a kidnapped woman who thinks she's a dog, but only gets the actual dog. A plan to exchange the dog for the woman goes awry.

eps.name: Rogue Wall Enthusiasts
eps.desc: While digging into Spring's past, Farah and Dirk find their first big clue; Todd learns he has no safe harbor; Amanda deals with a presence.

eps.name: Watkin
eps.desc: Dirk and Todd venture into Patrick's deathmaze and get a shock. Meanwhile, Weedle shares some unfortunate truths with Farah, and Gordon visits Lux's old flame.

eps.name: Very Erectus
eps.desc: As Dirk and Todd embark on a hunt for Patrick Spring’s dark enigmas, Todd reveals a deep-seated secret of his own. Detectives Estevez and Zimmerfield take big risks as they inch closer to the truth of their missing person’s investigation, and Amanda finally confronts the looming specter of the Rowdy 3.

eps.name: Fix Everything
eps.desc: Todd tries to confess to Amanda all of his lies from the past 10 years. Dirk and Farah are ambushed by Bart and Ken on their way to secure Dr. Webb's invention at the Spring Mansion.

eps.name: Weaponized Soul
eps.desc: Flung backwards through time, Dirk and Todd make a horrifying discovery about the nature of their case, and find themselves with a unique opportunity: solve their case before it even starts.

eps.name: Two Sane Guys Doing Normal Things
eps.desc: As dark forces converge, Dirk, Todd, Farah, and Detective Estevez are forced into a final battle: save Lydia Spring, face certain death, or both.
